lines.i: For any observation within the organizer, if the NEMSIS value is "Refused," the value SHALL be "NI;" the string "Refused" MAY be recorded in Observation.text.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.28"
SHALL conform to Consol Vital Signs Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10257)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Systolic Blood Pressure
Contains exactly one [1..1] Systolic Blood Pressure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.23.1)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Diastolic Blood Pressure
Contains exactly one [1..1] Diastolic Blood Pressure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.144)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Heart Rate
Contains exactly one [1..1] Heart Rate (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.145)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Respiratory Rate
Contains exactly one [1..1] Respiratory Rate (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.146)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Body Temperature
Contains exactly one [1..1] Body Temperature (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.176)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Oxygen Saturation
Contains exactly one [1..1] Oxygen Saturation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.177)
SHALL conform to Consol Vital Signs Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7279)
The vital signs organizer is a cluster of vital signs observations.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7280)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7282)
The organizer shall have an <id> element.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="46680005" Vital signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:7283)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:7284)
The observations have all been completed.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10257)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] component (CONF:7285, CONF:15946)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vital Sign Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Systolic Blood Pressure
Contains exactly one [1..1] Systolic Blood Pressure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.23.1)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Diastolic Blood Pressure
Contains exactly one [1..1] Diastolic Blood Pressure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.144)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Heart Rate
Contains exactly one [1..1] Heart Rate (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.145)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Respiratory Rate
Contains exactly one [1..1] Respiratory Rate (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.146)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Body Temperature
Contains exactly one [1..1] Body Temperature (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.176)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Oxygen Saturation
Contains exactly one [1..1] Oxygen Saturation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.177)
